title: Example partition demonstrating the structure (not a real partition)
description: This is an example partition file showing the expected JSON structure. Real partitions should group similar files from data/ folder based on content patterns and logical relationships.

entity_ontology.example_files_description: References to AWS services like S3, IAM, EC2 that integrate with ROSA clusters. These are cloud infrastructure components that ROSA depends on.
KCS solution articles that document troubleshooting steps, configurations, and best practices for ROSA.

relationship_ontology.example_files_description: KnowledgeBaseArticle entities document various AWS services and ROSA configurations. This relationship captures how documentation relates to technical concepts.
ROSA clusters require specific AWS credentials and permissions. This relationship captures dependency requirements between system components.
